About

Marka Email Generator exports HTML email templates. Templates work for all common email clients, including Gmail, Apple Mail, Outlook, and others.


You can create an email using ready-made blocks or create your own design from scratch.


The plugin supports two modes Responsive and Breakpoints.


Responsive mode

Mobile version creates automatically based on auto layout and constraints settings of a desktop frame.


Breakpoints mode

In this mode you can design special frame for desktop and mobile.


How to use:

1. Design a frame for desktop and optionally for mobile

2. Run the plugin and preview a template

3. Export an HTML file
